title: News24.com | Lockdown: 'Stay strong,' urges businesslike Ramaphosa
description: While President Cyril Ramaphosa contrasted the grim realities of the Covid-19 pandemic with the hope for a better future on Tuesday, his speech on Thursday was a much more technocratic affair.
content:
While President Cyril Ramaphosa contrasted the grim realities of the Covid-19 pandemic with the hope for a better future on Tuesday, his speech on Thursday evening was a much more technocratic affair.
